title: Bug 102436: Date/time value not stored correctly in report design
description: An invalid date/time string (which does not conform to a universal format or the system default locale format) should have been rejected.
OB: When entering an invalid date/time string in the report design, the system accepts the input without validating it and stores it.
EB: (2) The date value should have been validated by the UI or Model.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the report design interface. 
2. Enter an invalid date/time string into the date field. 
3. Save the report design. 
4. Check that the invalid date/time value is accepted and stored without any validation.
